alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:45PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Mercer County in northwestern Illinois... Southwestern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... Louisa County in southeastern Iowa... Southern Johnson County in east central Iowa... Washington County in southeastern Iowa... Muscatine County in east central Iowa... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 844 PM CDT, strong thunderstorm outflow winds were located along a line extending from near West Liberty to Webster, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Muscatine, Washington, Aledo, Wapello, Columbus Junction, West Liberty, Kalona, Wellman, Lone Tree, Andalusia, Riverside, Fruitland, Viola, Woodhull, Millersburg, Matherville, Hills, New Boston, Alpha and Brighton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
